Articles.Content:
Hi,

after not playing some time I tried 0.90 and started a new career. Just tested the mk16 and the LT45 and was about to land, and tired to watering my vessel with a filled fuel tank attached. The velocity was about 15m/s and I was not sure if the vessel would survive. So I quisaved 240m above sea level. It did not survive much (I think the command module was ok), so I tried to load the quicksave to seperate the command module.

HOWEVER.... The quicksave opens but the mk16 is not deployed (so it seems) and I now just smash into the water killing my Jebediah... I then killed the game hoping the persistent save was junger but no.

I still have the quicksave and tried to hack it but no success. Any ideas how to save my save file? And Jebediah....

I have Kerbal Engineer, Improved Chase Cam and Environment Visual Enhancements installed.

Best regards,

Carsten

Edited January 7, 2015 by callimero
